title: DWAC, Virgin Galactic, Exxon Mobil, DraftKings: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Donald Trump’s social-media platform went live in the U.S.; Virgin Galactic is due to report results
body:
Stock futures are wavering after Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered the deployment of troops to contested regions of Ukraine. Here’s what we’re watching in Tuesday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
